typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		movies as (movieid as string, title as string, genres as string[], year as string, rating as string),
		cast as string[],
		genres as string[],
		title as string,
		year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['output/avro/markavro.avro']) ~> source2
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['markavro.avro.snappy'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
